title: Does a BBA from Sikkim Manipal distance education qualify for good points in Canada? Will it be recognized by ICAS Canada? - Quora

response.answer_text: “An Educational credential assessment (ECA) is used to verify that your foreign degree, diploma, or certificate (or other proof of your credential) is valid and equal to a Canadian one. There are different types of ECAs. You need to get an ECA for immigration purposes.” Home | ICAS Educational credential assessment (ECA) for Express Entry: What it is You don’t say what you intend to use the evaluation form. A general answer: Online degrees are normally NOT accepted anywhere unless all your tests have been written in a secure, strictly controlled environment, that verifies that the tested is, indeed, the person he/she says he/she is. Otherwise, who knows who wrote the tests, and qualify for the degree. Your second cousin, or?

Yes, the distance education degrees are valid for Canada immigration. You can use the distance learning degrees for work visa, PR and student visas etc. You can move to Canada or any other country if you have a BBA degree from Sikkim Manipal University – Distance Education. Sikkim Manipal University, Gangtok is recognized by UGC and offers programs through Open & Distance Learning (ODL) mode.

Hello, No, Sikkim manipal don't have approvals like UGC, DEB, AICTE, AIU,etc. So its kind suggestion do not go for graduation from sikkim manipal. If you need proper guidance regarding this please feel free to ping/call.
